title: Rules concerning poisons
context: §330-2 Rules concerning poisons. The department of health may adopt rules concerning poisons and poison containers. [PC 1869, c 88, §1; am L 1872, c 16, §1; RL 1925, §1004; am L 1931, c 224, pt of §1; RL 1935, §1430; RL 1945, §2952; am L 1945, c 139, §1(b); RL 1955, §53-2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §19; HRS §330-2; am L 2001, c 2, §2] Cross References Rulemaking, see chapter 91.
